Posts.Content: Feb 22, 2011 10:25PM Dbug79 wrote: I have dreams almost every nightÂ about having my hair back. This has truly been one of the hardest things to deal with for me. I know that makes me sound vain or maybe shallow but my hair was one of the things I liked the most about my looks. I have 2 treatments left, (march 25th) I am really hoping to have enough hair (before the end of the summer) to get rid of the wig. You women inspire me and give me strength to keep pushing through! Hugs to you all!
